sense.gloss: in passing another (esp. colliding with oncoming traffic, bumping into a person), the moment two persons or objects meet

sdata.j: わたしが↑前↑↓まえ↓をよく↑見↑↓み↓てなかったから、↑出会↑↓|であ↓い↑頭↑↓がしら|↓にぶつかっちゃって。↑小川↑↓おがわ↓くんは↑悪↑↓わる↓くないわ。
sdata.e: Because I wasn't looking where I was going, I bumped into him when we passed. It wasn't his fault.
